amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 116-61 to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to set annual enrollment targets for the Exchanges for the plan year 2020 and each subsequent plan year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Pappas.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
